events.message: We have received the application from John Doe for the software engineer position and have stored all the relevant documents successfully.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to strong software development experience mentioned on the resume.
Recruiter Jane Smith was assigned to handle John Doe’s candidacy for the engineering role and will oversee the following recruitment steps.
Initial screening call with John Doe completed; candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and coding practices.
John Doe responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about advancing to the technical interview stage of the recruitment process.
Technical interview for the software engineer position was scheduled with John Doe for April 5th at 10 AM via video conference.
John Doe completed the technical interview successfully, showing strong problem-solving skills and deep understanding of software frameworks.
An HR interview has been scheduled for John Doe on April 7th to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations.
The HR interview with John Doe was completed; candidate showed alignment with company values and clear motivation for the role.
A formal job offer was proposed to John Doe including salary, benefits, and start date, awaiting candidate’s review and response.
John Doe provided positive feedback on the offer and is reviewing final details before making a final decision.
John Doe accepted the job offer for the software engineer role and confirmed availability to start within the specified timeline.
Onboarding process has started with John Doe, including account setup, introductions to team members, and initial training schedules.
The hiring process for John Doe is now closed successfully with all recruitment stages completed and employment officially started.
